arabicText: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُم مِّن طِينٍۢ لَّازِبٍۭ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	ask	them	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“Are	they	a	
stronger	creation,	or	are	other	things	of	our	
creation?”	We	have	indeed	created	them	from	
sticky	clay.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	un	se	puñcho	kyā		un	ki	paidāish	ziyāda	mazboṭ	
hai	yā	hāmāri	aur	makhloq	āasmānoñ	aur	farishtoñ	
waghaira	ki	be-shak	ham	ne	un	ko	chipakti	mitti	se	
banāyā.

englishTranslationText:
Rather	you	are	surprised,	whereas	they	keep	
mocking.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Balke	tumheñ	achanbā	āayā	aur	woh	hañsi	karte	
haiñ.

englishTranslationText: And	they	do	not	understand,	when	explained	to.
And	whenever	they	see	a	sign,	they	mock	at	it
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	jab	koyi	nishāni	dekhte	haiñ	thathā	karte	haiñ.

arabicText: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ
englishTranslationText: And	they	say,	“This	is	nothing	but	clear	magic.	”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	kahte	haiñ	ye	to	nahiñ	magar	khulā	jādo.

arabicText: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًۭا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“When	we	are	dead	and	have	turned	into	dust	
and	bones,	will	we	certainly	be	raised	again?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyā		jab	ham	mar	kar	mitti	aur	haddiyāñ	ho	jāyeñ	ge	
kyā		ham	zaroor	uthāye	jāyeñ	ge.
